trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for communicating with an XML Web service using the simple HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols bindings.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于使用简单的 HTTP-GET 和 HTTP-POST 协议绑定与 XML Web services 进行通信的基类。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies most of the implementation for communicating with an XML Web service over HTTP using encoders to encode the parameters and return values into common MIME formats.
trans-unit.target: 此类指定大部分用于通过 HTTP 使用编码器进行编码的参数和返回值转换常见 MIME 格式与 XML Web 服务进行通信的实现。

trans-unit.source: These encoders derive from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些编码器派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter>类。

trans-unit.source: By default, a proxy class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol> encodes parameters using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type and the response in plain XML.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，派生自的代理类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol>编码在纯 XML 中使用的应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded MIME 类型和响应的参数。

trans-unit.source: Custom mime formatters can be specified using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> attribute, however, there is no support for integrating this into a service description and proxy generation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用指定自定义的 mime 格式化程序<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute>属性，但是，没有将其集成到服务说明和代理生成的支持。

trans-unit.source: `Notes to Inheritors:` When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class that are specific to a particular type of an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: `Notes to Inheritors:` 当你重写此类时，可引入派生类中特定于特定类型的 XML Web 服务的方法。

trans-unit.source: The methods simply capture the parameters, and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the site.
trans-unit.target: 方法只需捕获参数，并调用基类，来执行与站点通信的工作。

trans-unit.source: If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 引入的方法是异步的如果调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 引入的方法是同步的如果调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The overridden constructor typically sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A> property to the URI of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 重写构造函数通常设置<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A>到 XML Web service 方法的 URI 的属性。

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) generates derived classes of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol> for a given Service Description.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的派生的类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol>有关给定的服务说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service below.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是由 Wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpGetClientProtocol>, which derives from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol> class.
trans-unit.target: 代理类派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpGetClientProtocol>，它派生自抽象<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建前面的代理类。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The URL to use when creating the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 时要使用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到 XML Web services 方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 数组中值的顺序与派生类的调用方法中的参数顺序对应。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.
trans-unit.target: 异步方法调用完成时要调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: If <c>callback</c> is <see langword="null" />, the delegate is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>callback</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则不调用委托。

trans-unit.source: The additional information supplied by a client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端提供的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous invocation of a method of an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步调用 XML Web services 的方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method to obtain the return values from the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，它可以传递到 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法以从 XML Web services 方法中获取返回值。

trans-unit.source: The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和返回值调用的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is also used to find custom attributes that may have been added to the method.
trans-unit.target: 它还用于查找可能已添加到该方法的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>, and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>，和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>派生方法所需的 HTTP 协议提供其他信息。

trans-unit.source: `asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `asyncState` 传递到`callback`并且包含在<xref:System.IAsyncResult>从返回<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is useful for passing information from the context of the asynchronous call to the handling of the asynchronous result in `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 它可用于将信息从对中的异步结果的处理的异步调用的上下文中传递`callback`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，后者将调用 XML Web 服务名为`Math`。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体启动和完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类的`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`BeginAdd`代理类的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法会启动异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建前面的代理类。

trans-unit.source: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned from the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 方法返回的 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 完成使用 HTTP 对 XML Web services 方法进行的异步调用。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the return value and any by reference or <paramref name="out" /> parameters for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象数组，包含 XML Web services 方法的返回值和所有通过引用传递的或 <paramref name="out" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，后者将调用 XML Web 服务名为`Math`。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体启动和完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类的`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`EndAdd`代理类的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法会启动异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建上述的代理类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is not the return value from the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不是 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 正调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])" /> 方法的派生类中的 XML Web services 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service method that the client is requesting.
trans-unit.target: 客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 方法的 URL。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the remote XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到远程 XML Web services 的参数。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 数组中值的顺序与派生类的调用方法中的参数顺序对应。

trans-unit.source: Invokes an XML Web service method using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTTP 调用 XML Web services 方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the return value and any by-reference or <paramref name="out" /> parameters of the derived class method.
trans-unit.target: 包含派生类方法的返回值、所有引用或 <paramref name="out" /> 参数的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和返回值调用的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is also used to find custom attributes which may have been added to the method.
trans-unit.target: 它还用于查找自定义属性添加到该方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> 和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>派生方法所需的 SOAP 协议提供其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，后者将调用 XML Web 服务名为`Math`。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form synchronously invokes the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体以同步方式调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类的`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method synchronously invokes the `Add` Web Service method.
trans-unit.target: 在`Add`代理类的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法以同步方式调用`Add`Web 服务方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建上述的代理类。

trans-unit.source: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 异步调用指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The request URL of the invoked web service.
trans-unit.target: 调用的 Web 服务的请求 URL。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The delegate called when the method invocation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 当方法调用完成后调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 异步调用指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The request URL of the invoked web service.
trans-unit.target: 调用的 Web 服务的请求 URL。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The delegate called when the method invocation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 当方法调用完成后调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: An object containing associated state information that is passed to the <c>callback</c> delegate when the method has completed.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含在方法完成时传递给 <c>callback</c> 委托的关联状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously while maintaining an associated state.
trans-unit.target: 在维护关联状态的同时，异步调用指定的方法。
